propertyDescriptor.name: EHRStudyContainer
propertyDescriptor.description: This is the path to the container holding the EHR study. Use of slashes is very important - it should be in the format '/myProject/ehr'

propertyDescriptor.name: EHRAdminUser
propertyDescriptor.description: The is the email address of a valid LabKey site admin user that will used to execute many background processes. The email does not need to match a valid address, but this user must be created within LabKey.

propertyDescriptor.name: EHRDefaultClinicalProjectName
propertyDescriptor.description: The is the display name of the default clinical project, which is typically used to handle no-cost and general clinical case.

propertyDescriptor.name: CacheDemographicsOnStartup
propertyDescriptor.description: If true, on startup the EHR will cache demographics data on all living animals, which can speed data entry

propertyDescriptor.name: DefaultAnimalHistoryReport
propertyDescriptor.description: The ID of the default report to show on the Animal History page. It defaults to 'abstract'.

propertyDescriptor.name: ProtocolPDFContainer
propertyDescriptor.description: This is the path to the container holding PDFs of IACUC protocols. It is usually separate from the EHR study. Use of slashes is very important - it should be in the format '/myProject/ehr'

propertyDescriptor.name: EHRDocumentationContainer
propertyDescriptor.description: This is the path to the container holding documentation and other materials. These material need to be created by the admins of the site. Use of slashes is very important - it should be in the format '/myProject/ehr'

propertyDescriptor.name: EHRIssuesContainer
propertyDescriptor.description: This is the path to a container with an issue tracker for the EHR. It is usually separate from the EHR study, and the issue tracker need to be configured manually be the admin. Use of slashes is very important - it should be in the format '/myProject/ehr'

propertyDescriptor.name: EHRSubmitForReviewPrincipal
propertyDescriptor.description: This is the name of the user or group that will be used as the default for the Review Required dialog in EHR data entry
